channel.title: My guthan doesn't work :(

item.title: My guthan doesn't work :(
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

That’s why it’s misc.random.
EDIT:

[quote=“Hey*, post:9, topic:230987”]public void guthan() { if(misc.random(3) == 1) { gfxRich(401); sendMessage("You drain your oponents health."); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } } }
So this would hit 1/3?[/quote]
Most likely.

Read full topic

item.title: My guthan doesn't work :(
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

[quote=“Hey*, post:7, topic:230987”]This will heal every time yeah?

But like how can I do it so guthan will heal about 1/3 time?
Hits 3 times then heals…[/quote]
it’s like rolling some dice that only have 1 & 2 on it… 1 being the spec
eg.
first hit is a 2
next hit is 2
nest hit is 1 [spec]
next hit is 2
next hit is 1 [spec]
etc…

Read full topic

So this would hit 1/3?

item.title: My guthan doesn't work :(
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Much better. Glad you saw your mistake ;).

And yes, this would work:

public void guthan() { gfxRich(401); sendMessage("You drain your oponents health."); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } }
EDIT: Sorry, you were right first time, didn’t see the second {.

Read full topic

gfxRich(401);
sendMessage(“You drain your oponents health.”);
NewHP += hitDiff;
if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);

}
}
maybe?..
[/quote]
That would give 100 errors.[/quote]

public void guthan() { gfxRich(401); sendMessage("You drain your oponents health."); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); }
try that

item.title: My guthan doesn't work :(
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Hey*, post:1, topic:230987”]My guthan heals very slowly when i attack a monster.
It heals very rarely.
How do I change the heal rate?

I have to hit like 10 times before the set will heal.
I want it to heal after every attack pls.

RichScape PK is the serv.

4724 - Helm
4726 - Spear
4728 - Body
4730 - Skirt
Item IDS

public void guthan() { if(misc.random(2) == 1) { gfxRich(401); sendMessage("You drain your oponents health."); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } } }

public boolean FullGuthanEquipped() { if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726) { return true; } return false; }

Do I need to modify them?

Help would be appreciated![/quote]
Delete the misc.random(2).

Read full topic

item.title: My guthan doesn't work :(
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

My guthan heals very slowly when i attack a monster.
It heals very rarely.
How do I change the heal rate?

I have to hit like 10 times before the set will heal.
I want it to heal after every attack pls.

RichScape PK is the serv.

4724 - Helm
4726 - Spear
4728 - Body
4730 - Skirt
Item IDS

public void guthan() { if(misc.random(2) == 1) { gfxRich(401); sendMessage("You drain your oponents health."); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } } }

public boolean FullGuthanEquipped() { if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726) { return true; } return false; }

Do I need to modify them?

Help would be appreciated!

Read full topic
